title: Social Studies Teaching Expertise Enhancement Program through Lesson Study Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A course for in-service practitioners to collaboratively design and implement lesson plans using digital devices. Emphasizes in-depth teaching-learning strategies for social themes.

learning_goals: Participants can apply a lesson study design framework based on Cultural Historical Activity Theory (CHAT) and Community of Practice (CoP) theory.
Participants can generate one or more social studies lesson improvement plans through peer collaboration and reflective practice.
Participants can revise lesson designs based on formative assessment data using digital tools (e.g., collaboration platforms, analytical software).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
